summary:
PILL 10
Dudley: chi è Cedric? Il tuo ragazzo? *sghignazza*
Harry: fottiti Dudley, io amo Draco
Draco: *spunta da dai cespugli...
body:
PILL 10


Dudley: chi è Cedric? Il tuo ragazzo? *sghignazza*


Harry: fottiti Dudley, io amo Draco


Draco: *spunta da dai cespugli che in realtà non ci sono* LO SAPEVO CHE MI AMAVI POTTAH

summary: It has been 24 years since the Battle of Hogwarts occurred and Harry Potter defeated Voldemort. Since then, the Wizarding World...
caption:
It has been 24 years since the Battle of Hogwarts occurred and Harry Potter defeated Voldemort. Since then, the Wizarding World has been in relative peace, able to progress without the worry of Death Eaters. They’ve embraced technology and have been blossomed into the twenty first century.

However, while the Wizarding World as a whole is flourishing, the individuals within the Wizarding World are plagued by their own problems, and their problems come with their own share of secrets.

Unfortunately, mysterious letters, signed only by ~X, have been sent to the students and staff at Hogwarts. X has somehow learned of all of their secrets, and they are going to have a bit of fun with that.

How far will the residents of the castle go to keep their secrets safe?

SecretaHQ is a semi-appless Harry Potter Next Generation RP

          HOME ~ ASK ~ PLOT ~ RULES ~ FAQ ~ APPLY

summary: 2018 Golden Chalices Awards!
title: 2018 Golden Chalices Awards!
body:
July in the Hufflepuff Common Room brought a celebration of stories by our talented black and yellow clad authors. Here are the results - we can’t recommend these stories enough!

Best Reviewer

WINNER: just.a.willow.tree 

RUNNER-UP: Stella Blue

Best Friendship

WINNER: George and Ron Weasley in Then Time Stood Still by Levana

RUNNER-UP: Regulus Black and Summer Phillips in When Summer Fades by Stella Blue

Best Character Arc / Development

WINNER: Finn Blishwick in The Harder They Fall by victoria_anne

RUNNER-UP: Hannah Abbott in When I Go Out With You by Dojh167

Best Depiction of a Minor Canon Character

WINNER: Justin Finch-Fletchley in Goodbye, Jus by Felpata_Lupin

RUNNER-UP: Astoria Greengrass in Five Lives by just.a.willow.tree

Best Depiction of a Major Canon Character

WINNER: George Weasley in Then Time Stood Still by Levana

RUNNER-UP: Lily Evans in Untrue, Untrue by just.a.willow.tree

Best Original Character

WINNER: Josephine Adaire in Lying Josephine by WriteYourHeartOut

RUNNER-UP: Summer Phillips in When Summer Fades by Stella Blue

Best Multi-Chap

WINNER: The Harder They Fall by victoria_anne

RUNNER-UP: Beyond Repair by MuggleMaybe

Best One-Shot

WINNER: Waltz by WriteYourHeartOut

RUNNER-UP: Goodbye, Love, Goodbye by MuggleMaybe

Best Original Fiction

WINNER: The Maidens and the Tower by MuggleMaybe

RUNNER-UP: What is Life by Felpata_Lupin

Best Description:

WINNER: The Firework-Maker’s Daughter by esmeraude

RUNNER-UP: Spring Barges In by Jo Raskoph

Best Dialogue

WINNER: All the Truth About Jimmy Portman by Felpata_Lupin

RUNNER-UP: The Prince and the Pirate by banshee

Most Inclusive Story

WINNER: Icarus by Stella Blue

RUNNER-UP: When I Go Out With You by Dojh167

Most Addicting Story

WINNER: The Harder They Fall by victoria_anne

RUNNER-UP: Nights Like These by banshee

Best Dark Fic

WINNER: Five Lives by just.a.willow.tree

RUNNER UP: Hope by Jo Raskoph | Ninety-Two Seconds in Catatonia by MuggleMaybe

Best Light Fic

WINNER: Ministry Memorandums (From the Mysteries) by esmeraude

RUNNER-UP: Footsteps in the Forest by Dojh167

Congratulations to all our winners! All are very deserving stories and well worth the read!

summary: Potterheads You Need This Edible Harry Potter Merch In Your Lives
title: Potterheads You Need This Edible Harry Potter Merch In Your Lives
body:
Potterheads You Need This Edible Harry Potter Merch In Your Lives

Accio Potterheads, because for the 20th anniversary of the American release of the Sorcerer’s Stone (that’s the Philosopher’s Stone to the rest of the world), the Jelly Belly Candy Company is launching some exciting new treats that will hit stores on October 1st!

Some of the edible merch that you can expectare chocolate wands, house crests, and delicious gummy creatures! You can swirl around…

View On WordPress

tags: harry potter and the sorcerer’s stone
summary: Let’s take a moment to appreciate that Hagrid never undid giving Dudley Dursley a pigtail.
body:
Let’s take a moment to appreciate that Hagrid never undid giving Dudley Dursley a pigtail.


Did he have it forever? Did he have to have a weird conversation with a doctor or vet?

summary:
Ravenclaw: I need coffee.
Gryffindor: You shouldn’t be having more than three cups a day, and this is your fifth cup in the last...
body:
Ravenclaw: I need coffee.

Gryffindor: You shouldn’t be having more than three cups a day, and this is your fifth cup in the last two hours.

Ravenclaw: Give me coffee you weak ass bitch.

reblog.comment:
Ravenclaw: I need coffee.

Ravenclaw: Give me coffee you weak ass bitch.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary:
draco: i challenge you to a duel!
harry: malfoy, we're first years, i know maybe three spells
draco: i challenge you to a...
body:
draco: i challenge you to a duel!
harry: malfoy, we're first years, i know maybe three spells
draco: i challenge you to a bake-off?
harry: whisks at dawn, motherfucker

summary: It has been 24 years since the Battle of Hogwarts occurred and Harry Potter defeated Voldemort. Since then, the Wizarding World...
caption:
It has been 24 years since the Battle of Hogwarts occurred and Harry Potter defeated Voldemort. Since then, the Wizarding World has been in relative peace, able to progress without the worry of Death Eaters. They’ve embraced technology and have been blossomed into the twenty first century.

However, while the Wizarding World as a whole is flourishing, the individuals within the Wizarding World are plagued by their own problems, and their problems come with their own share of secrets.

Unfortunately, mysterious letters, signed only by ~X, have been sent to the students and staff at Hogwarts. X has somehow learned of all of their secrets, and they are going to have a bit of fun with that.

How far will the residents of the castle go to keep their secrets safe?

question: @Regulus, I know you're still trying to figure out what to do relationship-wise, but have you maybe considered a palette cleanser? It doesn't have to be a permanent arrangement, just to help you get your mind off of things.
answer: Regulus: I don’t really know what that is…. am I being stupid?

blog.name: prasygold
blog.title: I love you 3000
blog.description: Just another girl who couldn't stick to one fandom | Masterlist

summary:
It's the little things 
Spending a winter evening with George and his family at the burrow: 
～ Sitting on his lap,your back...
body:
It’s the little things

(George Weasley x reader)

Spending a winter evening with George and his family at the burrow:

～ Sitting on his lap,your back facing him, feeling his arms circle around your waist securely.

～Your cold hands gripping the sleeves of his sweater, enjoying the warmth it radiates.

～ Leaning your head back over his chest, inhaling his scent - oh, how much he made you feel home.

～You giggling at Fred’s joke.

～Having playful snowball fights

～Enjoying Molly’s cookies, her welcoming you with joyful heart

～ Feeling his laughter vibrating over his chest.

～ You slightly turning around to place a soft kiss over his neck, making him look down at your vibrant face with a joyful smile over his lips, kissing your temple.

～Him playing with your hair

～Enjoying the rest of the day filled with delicious food and laughter,oh and some sweet kisses too ;)

summary:
Sleepless night
You spend few holidays at the burrow with Fred and his family :
｀Tossing and turning around for hours, mumbling...
body:
Sleepless night

(Fred Weasley x reader)

You spend few holidays at the burrow with Fred and his family :

｀Tossing and turning around for hours, mumbling curses unable to sleep

｀Laying wide awake in bed, annoyed.

｀Deciding whether to wake you peacefully sleeping boyfriend or not.

｀ Choosing the first option and tip toeing your way to his and George’s room, not to wake up other Weasleys.

｀Adjusting your eyesight in middle of the night to make sure you don’t wake up the wrong twin

｀Slowly walking up trying not to wake his brother up.

｀ You having second thoughts after watching how peaceful he looks in his sleep

｀"whatever" you muttered deciding to wake him up.

｀"Fred… Freddie….psst… Fred…. “ you leaned over his bed, whispering.

｀ Sighing when he didn’t move, you took his cover and getting next to him, almost laying on top of him.

｀He stirred from his slumber, you felt bad for few seconds, ” I can’t sleep" you mumbled.

｀He pulled you closer, still closing his eyes. He tucked your head under his chin, his arm around you body.

｀Smiling, you placed a tender kiss over his cheek, you swore you just saw him smile

｀You happily dozed off with sense of comfort around you.

｀George teasing you and him the next morning, saying something happened last night ;)

summary: Hey Bella! Been lezzing off lately or still pining after Voldemort?
question: Hey Bella! Been lezzing off lately or still pining after Voldemort?
answer:
Bellatrix: What do you mean by “lezzing off”? 

Bellatrix: I’m not pining after The Dark Lord - I’m getting exactly want I want.  *Smirks*
